textAfterTable: City Councilman, At Large - 4 year term Candidate Total Nix, Bryan 2,856 - 59.54% Whelan, Tom 1,941 - 40.46% Boulder City Question No. 1 Shall the People of the City of Boulder City enact the following new Chapter to Title 9 of the Boulder City Municipal Code CONTENT FOR DIVERSION OR CHANGE OF ROUTE OF HIGHWAY Whenever it is determined by the governmental entities concerned the a new bridge will be constructed over the Colorado River near Hoover Dam, and the State of Nevada, after the required studies and investigations, conclude that a new highway, connecting the existing freeway that terminates near Railroad Pass Hotel and Casino to the new bridge approach is desirable, and if the preferred routing of this new highway, as determined by the required studies, meets the following criteria: It is south of the Boulder City Airport; It is at least three-fourths (3/4) of one mile from any existing residence in Boulder City; and At least two (2) interchanges will be provided to serve Boulder City, and just east and one just west of Boulder City and configured to permit all traffic the option to use the existing highway through Boulder City (heavy trucks may be prohibited) or the new highway around Boulder City; then the Boulder City Council shall give its consent to the State
